title: (x) Hotel Bellwether - Trajan {Ken M}
content:
This is a crappy traced font that has been used for print WAY to many times until it was handed into my hands. I said NO. I won’t produce a design with a lousily traced font.

What exactly is this font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704153605im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/belwether_6345.gif)

Thanks

 [‹ (x) Sundance Grill - modified Chascarillo {Kate}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704153605/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36431 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Flower Mounds Jaguars w/ spiky serifs - (similar to) Penumbra {Mike Y} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704153605/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36429 "Go to next forum topic")
author: retoid

comments.content:
Ithink this is supposed to be Trajan.

[http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=trajan](http://web.archive.org/web/20080704153605/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=trajan "http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=trajan")

Bryan, I didn’t realize you were from Bellingham. We visit there pretty often, since our daughter lives there. I recognized the Hotel name right away. Very popular for weddings, right on Bellingham Bay, surrounded by marinas.

- Mike Yanega

Thanks for the font ID guys.

bowfinpw: Yes, its a very nice hotel :)  
I received the job to layout a few items for them and noticed the font was traced from a low res jpg :( Not good.

Where are you from?

I’m in Federal Way, about 25 miles south of Seattle.

- Mike Yanega
